item.title: 耐克股东投票反对工人权利提案
item.description: 耐克公司周二表示，该公司股东在年度会议上投票反对一项提案，即考虑与供应链工人签订具有约束力的协议，以更好地处理高风险国家的人权问题。【原文：Nike shareholders have voted against a proposal to consider joining binding agreements with supply chain workers to better address human rights issues in high-risk countries at its annual meeting, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：新日铁高管飞赴华盛顿，为挽救美国钢铁交易做最后努力
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，日本钢铁制造商新日铁的副董事长将于周三在华盛顿会见美国高级官员，试图挽救其拟斥资 149 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的计划。【原文：Japanese steelmaker Nippon Steel's vice-chair will meet senior U.S. officials in Washington on Wednesday in an attempt to save its proposed $14.9 billion takeover of U.S. Steel , the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 银行数据显示，新西兰元和日本债券削弱了对冲基金 8 月份的收益趋势
item.description: 路透社周二看到的法国兴业银行数据显示，8 月份全球市场剧烈波动，趋势跟踪对冲基金因押注新西兰元和日本股票及债券而受到冲击。【原文：Trend-following hedge funds took a hit from their bets on the New Zealand dollar and Japanese stocks and bonds in August, when global markets were rattled by extreme volatility, according to Societe Generale data seen by Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 星巴克新任首席执行官将改善美国门店作为首要任务
item.description: 周二，星巴克新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）制定了他的第一个百日计划，表示他将专注于提升美国门店的顾客体验和咖啡馆文化。【原文：Starbucks new CEO Brian Niccol laid out his plan for the first 100 days on Tuesday, saying he would focus on enhancing customer experience and coffeehouse culture at its stores in the United States.】

item.title: 美联储巴尔在遭到反对和拖延后公布了全面的银行资本计划修订案
item.description: 美联储监管主管周二概述了一项全面的改革计划，放宽了两项主要的银行资本规则草案，而此前业界的强烈反对曾导致项目延期，并引发了联邦银行业最高监管机构之间的分歧。【原文：The Federal Reserve's regulatory chief on Tuesday outlined a sweeping overhaul easing two major draft bank capital rules following intense industry opposition that delayed the projects and sparked divisions among the top federal banking regulators.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局调查达美航空公司飞机撞击支线喷气机尾部事件
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周二称，该公司一架飞机在亚特兰大机场滑行准备起飞时，机翼撞上了一架支线喷气式飞机，两架飞机均受损。【原文：Delta Air Lines said Tuesday the wing of one of its planes struck a regional jet while taxiing for departure at Atlanta airport, damaging both aircraft.】

item.title: 法国央行认为第三季度奥运经济增长势头强劲
item.description: 法国央行周二在其月度商业调查报告中称，举办奥运会推动了法国服务业在8月份的发展，但该国的政治危机仍给经济前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Hosting the Olympic Games gave a boost to France's service sector in August but the country's political crisis still clouds the economic outlook, the central bank said on Tuesday in its monthly business survey.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预计合并和首次公开募股的趋势将持续到 2024 年
item.description: 摩根士丹利联席总裁丹-西姆科维茨（Dan Simkowitz）周二表示，摩根士丹利预计今年下半年的并购和首次公开募股活动仍将低于趋势。【原文：Morgan Stanley expects activity for mergers, acquisitions and initial public offerings to remain below trends for the rest of the year, its co-president Dan Simkowitz said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软支持的 Rubrik 公司临近 IPO 锁定期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，Rubrik 股价下跌超过 6%，因为市场正等待与其首次公开募股相关的锁定期到期，这给这家由微软支持的网络安全公司乐观的第二季度营收蒙上了阴影。【原文：Shares of Rubrik fell more than 6% on Tuesday, as the markets braced for the expiry of a lockup period tied to its initial public offering, clouding the Microsoft-backed cybersecurity company's upbeat second-quarter revenue.】

item.title: 金宝汤公司去掉名称中的 "汤 "字，更名为 "金宝公司"。
item.description: 金宝汤公司（Campbell Soup）首席执行官马克-克劳斯（Mark Clouse）周二表示，金宝汤公司的名称将去掉 "汤 "字，更名为 "金宝公司"（The Campbell's Company）。【原文：Campbell Soup is dropping "soup" from its name to become "The Campbell's Company," CEO Mark Clouse said on Tuesday, a pivot symbolizing the company's shift to other packaged food such as jarred sauces like Rao's and Goldfish snacks.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国联邦贸易委员会告诉 Seven & i 公司，它打算调查 Couche-Tard 的潜在交易
item.description: 一位熟知内情的消息人士称，美国联邦贸易委员会已通知 Seven & i 公司，有意调查加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司出于反垄断考虑收购该连锁便利店的可能性。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has notified Seven & i of its intention to investigate a potential takeover of the convenience store chain by Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard over antitrust concerns, a source familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 空中客车公司首席执行官对新发动机技术持乐观态度，但尚无定论
item.description: 欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus）负责人表示，发动机制造商CFM国际公司正在测试的新型开放式转子技术有望提高效率并减少排放，但这种技术是否可行 "尚无定论"。【原文：The head of European planemaker Airbus said novel open-rotor technology being tested by engine maker CFM International offers promising efficiencies and reductions in emissions but that the "jury is out" on whether it will be viable.】

item.title: 美联储将于 9 月 18 日降息 25 个基点，2024 年再降息两次：路透调查
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，101 位经济学家中只有 9 位预计美联储将在 2024 年剩余的三次政策会议上每次降息 25 个基点。【原文：The Federal Reserve will lower interest rates by 25 basis points at each of the U.S. central bank's three remaining policy meetings in 2024, according to a majority of economists in a Reuters poll that found only nine of 101 expected a half-percentage-point cut next week.】

item.title: 波音公司 8 月份交付 40 架喷气式飞机，比去年同期增加 5 架
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司在8月份交付了40架商用喷气式飞机，比2023年同期增加了5架，当时该公司的737 MAX飞机因制造缺陷而陷入困境。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 40 commercial jets in August, up five from the same month in 2023 when it struggled with a manufacturing defect on its 737 MAX, as the U.S. planemaker eyes higher output under new CEO Kelly Ortberg.】

item.title: 耐克在首席执行官约翰-多纳霍领导下发生的重要事件
item.description: 耐克公司将于本周二举行年度会议，投票表决的一个关键议题是工人权利协议，这将使该公司首席执行官约翰-多纳霍（John Donahoe）成为焦点，他正面临着扭转这家运动服装巨头长期销售低迷的压力。【原文：Nike will hold its annual meeting virtually on Tuesday and a key issue to be voted on will be a workers' rights agreement, putting the spotlight on its CEO John Donahoe who is under pressure to reverse a long sales slump at the sportswear giant.】

item.title: Ally Financial面临 "日益加剧 "的信贷挑战，股价暴跌
item.description: Ally Financial首席财务官拉塞尔-哈钦森（Russell Hutchinson）周二表示，由于借款人在高通胀和生活成本的压力下挣扎，Ally Financial的信贷挑战在本季度加剧，导致其股价下跌17%。【原文：Ally Financial's credit challenges have intensified over the quarter as borrowers struggled with high inflation and costs of living, the consumer lender's chief financial officer Russell Hutchinson said on Tuesday, sending its shares down 17%.】

item.title: 哈里斯和特朗普的税收与支出计划如何影响美国债务
item.description: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）和共和党对手唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）都提出了新的减税和支出计划，他们试图通过说服美国人他们的想法将更多地减轻他们的经济负担来赢得选票。【原文：Vice President Kamala Harris and Republican opponent Donald Trump have floated new tax breaks and spending plans, as they try to win votes by persuading Americans their ideas will do more to ease their financial burdens.】

item.title: 摩根大通第三季度投资银行业务收费猛增 15
item.description: 摩根大通总裁兼首席运营官丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）周二表示，摩根大通第三季度的投资银行业务费用可能会攀升 15%。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's investment banking fees could climb 15% in the third quarter, its president and chief operating officer Daniel Pinto said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人口普查数据显示，2023 年美国经通胀调整后的收入有所增长，而贫困率却有所上升
item.description: 美国人口普查局（U.S. Census Bureau）周二发布报告称，去年美国经通胀调整后的家庭收入有所增加，但衡量贫困率的指标也有所上升，这简要说明了美国家庭在经济恢复到冠状病毒大流行前的增长水平、就业增长蓬勃和通胀缓解时的状况。【原文：U.S. inflation-adjusted household income increased but a measure of the poverty rate also edged up last year, the U.S. Census Bureau reported on Tuesday, offering a snapshot of how American households fared as the economy returned to pre-coronavirus pandemic growth levels, job growth boomed and inflation eased.】

item.title: 2023 年美国人使用的无线数据量将达到创纪录的 100 万亿兆字节
item.description: 周二发布的一项行业调查显示，2023 年美国人的无线数据使用量将略高于 100 万亿兆字节，比上年增长 36%，是无线数据消费增长幅度最大的一年。【原文：Americans used just over 100 trillion megabytes of wireless data in 2023, up 36% over the prior year in the largest single-year increase in wireless data consumption, according to an industry survey released Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局（FAA）需要确保在波音 737 MAX 生产增长之前有足够的安全指标--机构
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长周二表示，该机构必须确保飞机制造商的安全流程足够完善，才能取消 737 MAX 的生产上限。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said Tuesday the agency must ensure the planemaker's safety processes are adequate before it will lift its 737 MAX production cap.】

item.title: 工会表示，大众汽车废除了已有几十年历史的德国就业保障协议
item.description: 大众汽车公司周二向 IG Metall 发出通知，将废除一系列劳动协议，其中包括在德国六家工厂保障工作岗位至 2029 年的协议。【原文：Volkswagen gave IG Metall notice on Tuesday it was scrapping a range of labour agreements including a guarantee of jobs until 2029 at six German plants, the union said.】

item.title: Salesforce 将本地云平台扩展至以色列
item.description: 云软件公司 Salesforce 周二表示，其 Hyperforce 云平台现已在以色列投入使用，这将使敏感的政府和公司数据留在当地。【原文：Cloud software firm Salesforce said on Tuesday its Hyperforce cloud platform was now available in Israel, which will allow sensitive government and companies' data to stay local.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙表示，接班是他最重要的任务
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周二表示，摩根大通专注于继任计划，并拥有一批 "非常 "合格的人才，他们已经做好了管理公司的准备。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is focused on succession planning and has a cadre of "extremely" qualified people who are prepared to run the company, CEO Jamie Dimon said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 迪尔支付993万美元了结美国证券交易委员会的贿赂调查
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）对迪尔公司违反联邦贿赂法《反海外腐败法》（Foreign Corrupt Practices Act）的行为进行了调查，迪尔公司同意支付 993 万美元和解。【原文：Deere agreed to pay $9.93 million to settle a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission probe into violations of a federal bribery law, the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act, the regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称，Keurig 将就豆荚可回收性声明支付 150 万美元罚款
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchanges Commission）周二表示，Keurig Dr Pepper Inc 同意支付 150 万美元的罚款，以了结该委员会对该饮料公司就其 K-Cup 豆荚的可回收性所做的不实陈述的指控。【原文：Keurig Dr Pepper Inc agreed to pay a $1.5 million fine to settle U.S. Securities and Exchanges Commission charges that the beverage company made inaccurate statements regarding the recyclability of its K-Cup pods, the regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称数据中心运营商 Switch 考虑以约 400 亿美元的估值进行 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Switch 的所有者正在探讨这家数据中心运营商的首次公开募股（IPO）事宜，包括债务在内，其估值可能达到约 400 亿美元。【原文：The owners of Switch are exploring an initial public offering (IPO) of the data center operator that could value it at about $40 billion, including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称贸易中断可能阻碍抗击通胀
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: 梅赛德斯与 Factorial 合作开发固态电池
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）和美国电池初创公司 Factorial 周二表示，双方正在研发一种固态电池，该电池可大幅提高电动汽车的续航里程，并可在本世纪末投入生产。【原文：Mercedes-Benz and U.S. battery startup Factorial are working on a solid-state battery that should dramatically increase electric vehicle range and be ready for production by the end of the decade, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 欧佩克再次下调 2024、2025 年全球石油需求增长预期
item.description: 欧佩克（OPEC）周二下调了对2024年全球石油需求增长的预测，以反映今年迄今收到的数据，同时还下调了对明年的预期，这是该生产国集团连续第二次下调预期。【原文：OPEC on Tuesday cut its forecast for global oil demand growth in 2024 reflecting data received so far this year and also trimmed its expectation for next year, marking the producer group's second consecutive downward revision.】
